aircraft.value: Viper Strike-3 - AC-2498-205 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Canopy seal deterioration. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 23/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 25/05/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 25/05/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 28/05/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 31/05/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Canopy seal deterioration. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
